changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Refonte du moteur de lien avec Netatmo: Redesign of the link engine with Netatmo
changelog.md.le widget n'est plus spécifique et passe: the widget is no longer specific and switches to core widgets (no longer configurable

index.md.Plugin permettant de récupérer les infor: Plugin to retrieve information from weather stations Netatmo
index.md.Une fois le plugin installé, il vous fau: Once the plugin is installed, you need to enter your Netatmo connection information
index.md.permet de synchroniser Jeedom avec votre: allows you to synchronize Jeedom with your Netamo account to automatically discover your Netamo equipment
index.md.A faire après avoir sauvegardé les param: To do after saving the previous parameters
index.md.Identifiez vous, avec votre mail et mot: Identify yourself, with your email and password
index.md.Remplissez les champs \"Name\" et \"Desc: Fill in the "Name" and "Description" fields (whatever you put it doesn't matter
index.md.Puis tout en bas de la page cochez la ca: Then at the very bottom of the page check the box "I accept the terms of use" then click on "Create
index.md.Recuperer les informations \"CLient id\": Retrieve the "Client id" and "Client secret" information and copy them in the configuration part of the plugin in Jeedom (see previous chapter
index.md.Attention il faut bien que l'url de call: Please note that the callback url must be "None" otherwise it will not work
index.md.La configuration des équipements Netatmo: The configuration of Netatmo equipment is accessible from the menuplugin
index.md.Voilà à quoi ressemble la page du plugin: This is what the Netatmo plugin page looks like (here with already 2 equipment
index.md.Comme à beaucoup d'endroits sur Jeedom,: As in many places on Jeedom, placing the mouse to the far left brings up a quick access menu (you can from your profile always leave it visible
index.md.Une fois que vous cliquez sur un équipem: Once you click on a piece of equipment you get
index.md.Vous retrouvez ici toute la configuratio: Here you find all the configuration of your equipment
index.md.indique l'objet parent auquel appartient: indicates the parent object to which the equipment belongs
index.md.le rend visible sur le dashboard: makes it visible on the dashboard
index.md.type de votre équipement (station, sonde: type of your equipment (station, indoor probe, outdoor probe
index.md.En dessous vous retrouvez la liste des c: Below you find the list of orders
index.md.le nom affiché sur le dashboard: the name displayed on the dashboard
index.md.permet d'afficher la configuration avanc: displays the advanced configuration of the command (logging method, widget, etc.)
index.md.Voici le widget standard pour une statio: Here is the standard widget for a station on the dashboard
index.md.Le systeme recupère les informations tou: The system retrieves information every 15 min
index.md.J'ai bien mes sondes mais aucune valeur: I have my probes but no value that goes back
index.md.Ca arrive quand il y a un soucis coté mi: It happens when there is a problem listed update on modules or Netatmo
index.md.Le plus simple est d'Ajouter \/ Supprime: The easiest way is to Add / Remove a module and to follow the process it will force an update of everything and should correct the problem
